comment: Do not use racial slurs when responding to others.
amr:

      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (s / slur
            :mod (r / race))
      :time (r2 / respond-01

            :ARG1 (p / person

comment: Please don't use racial slurs. All races of people are wildly different and unique.
amr:
# ::snt Please don't use racial slurs. All races of people are wildly different and unique.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / use-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (s / slur
                  :mod (r / race
                        :mod (a / all))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (d / differ-02
                  :ARG1 r
                  :mod r)
            :manner (w / wild))
      :op2 (u2 / unique-01
            :ARG1 r))
